con:part.con:content: <application xmlns="http://wadl.dev.java.net/2009/02" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <grammars> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="unqualified"> <xs:element name="accessTokenValidation" type="accessTokenValidation"/> <xs:element name="oAuthPermission" type="oAuthPermission"/> <xs:element name="userSubject" type="userSubject"/> <xs:complexType name="accessTokenValidation"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="audience" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="clientId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="clientSubject" type="userSubject"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="tokenGrantType" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="tokenIssuedAt" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="tokenKey" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="tokenLifetime" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="tokenScopes" nillable="true" type="oAuthPermission"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="tokenSubject" type="userSubject"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="tokenType" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="userSubject"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="id" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="login" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="properties"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="entry"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="key" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="value" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="roles" nillable="true" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="oAuthPermission"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="permission"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="httpVerbs" nillable="true" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="uris" nillable="true" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="permission"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="default" type="xs:boolean"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="description" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="permission" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> </grammars> <resources base="http://localhost:10080/UserService/service/oauth"> <resource path="/token"> <method name="POST"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/x-www-form-urlencoded"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="/validate"> <method name="POST"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/x-www-form-urlencoded"> <param name="authScheme" style="query" type="xs:string"/> <param name="authSchemeData" style="query" type="xs:string"/> </representation> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> </resources> </application>

<application xmlns="http://wadl.dev.java.net/2009/02" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <grammars/> <resources base="http://localhost:10080/UserService/service/rest/v1"> <resource path="/users/"> <method name="GET"> <request> <param name="page" style="query" type="xs:int"/> <param name="size" style="query" type="xs:int"/> <param name="sortDir" style="query" type="xs:string"> <option value="ASC"/> <option value="DESC"/> </param> <param name="sortedBy" style="query" type="xs:string"/> <param name="birthdate.time" style="query" type="xs:long"/> <param name="birthdate.year" style="query" type="xs:int"/> <param name="birthdate.month" style="query" type="xs:int"/> <param name="birthdate.date" style="query" type="xs:int"/> <param name="birthdate.hours" style="query" type="xs:int"/> <param name="birthdate.minutes" style="query" type="xs:int"/> <param name="birthdate.seconds" style="query" type="xs:int"/> <param name="birthdate.day" style="query" type="xs:int"/> <param name="birthdate.timezoneoffset" style="query" type="xs:int"/> <param name="email" style="query" type="xs:string"/> <param name="login" style="query" type="xs:string"/> <param name="firstname" style="query" type="xs:string"/> <param name="lastname" style="query" type="xs:string"/> <param name="gender" style="query"/> <param name="password" style="query" type="xs:string"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> <method name="POST"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> <method name="PUT"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> <resource path="{email}/"> <param name="email" style="template" type="xs:string"/> <method name="DELETE"> <request/> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> <method name="GET"> <request/> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> </resource> <resource path="/status/"> <method name="GET"> <request/> <response> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> </resource> <resource path="/authorize"> <method name="GET"> <response> <representation mediaType="application/xhtml+xml"/> <representation mediaType="text/html"/> <representation mediaType="application/xml"/> <representation mediaType="application/json"/> </response> </method> <resource path="/decision"> <method name="GET"> <response> <representation mediaType="application/octet-stream"/> </response> </method> <method name="POST"> <request> <representation mediaType="application/x-www-form-urlencoded"/> </request> <response> <representation mediaType="application/octet-stream"/> </response> </method> </resource> </resource> </resources> </application>
